summary.span: "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UNDONE: (Danmose) Überprüfen der Unveränderlichkeit.UNDONE: (danmose) Review immutability. Wenn dies nicht unveränderlich ist, fügen Sie einen Mechanismus zum Benachrichtigen der Projekt-Auflistung/s besitzt, um ihre Projektsammlung(en) erhöhen.If this is not immutable, add a mechanism to notify the project collection/s owning it to increment their toolsetVersion.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultSubToolsetVersion { get; }
.property instance string DefaultSubToolsetVersion
Public ReadOnly Property DefaultSubToolsetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultSubToolsetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the default sub toolset version for this toolset.

span.span: Gets the default sub toolset version for this toolset.
Returns the default sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] ist installiert und im basistoolset verwenden und zurückgeben eine Sub-Toolset-Version von "10.0".If [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is installed, use the base toolset and return a sub toolset version of "10.0". Verwenden Sie andernfalls die höchste systemversionsverwaltung unter-Toolsets gefunden.Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub toolset found. Unter-Toolsets mit nummerierten Versionen sind numerisch sortiert; alle zusätzlichen unter-Toolsets an den Anfang der Liste in der Reihenfolge ihres Erscheinens vorangestellt.Sub toolsets with numbered versions are ordered numerically; any additional sub toolsets are prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found. Gibt null, wenn keine Sub-Toolset vorhanden ist und [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] ist nicht installiert.Returns null if there is no sub toolset available and [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is not installed.

summary.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion() cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion () As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion();

summary.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

returns.span: Returns the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

span.span: Returns the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn "VisualStudioVersion" auf das Toolset selbst als Eigenschaft festgelegt ist, wird der Sub-Toolset-Version auf "VisualStudioVersion" festgelegt.If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". Sub-Toolsetversion ist, andernfalls der DefaultSubToolsetVersion des Toolsets fest.Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> overrideGlobalProperties, int32 solutionVersion) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion (overrideGlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), solutionVersion As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);

param.name: overrideGlobalProperties
param.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

span.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

param.span: May be null.

span.span: May be null.

param.name: solutionVersion
param.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

span.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

summary.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.
Returns the sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn die globale Eigenschaft in der Menge der globalen Eigenschaften vorhanden ist "VisualStudioVersion" übergeben, wird der Sub-Toolset-Version auf "VisualStudioVersion" festgelegt.If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of global properties passed in, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". Wenn "VisualStudioVersion" auf das Toolset selbst als Eigenschaft festgelegt ist, wird Sub-Toolset-Version auf "VisualStudioVersion" festgelegt.Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". Andernfalls gilt: Wenn die Visual Studio-Version, die auf die Version der Projektmappe entspricht (Visual Studio-Version = Lösungsversion – 1) übergeben Maps zu einer vorhandenen unter-Toolsets Sub Toolsetversion auf die Visual Studio-Version festgelegt ist.Otherwise, if the Visual Studio version corresponding to the solution version (Visual Studio version = solution version – 1) passed in maps to an existing sub toolset, then sub toolset version is set to the Visual Studio version. Sub-Toolsetversion ist, andernfalls der DefaultSubToolsetVersion des Toolsets fest.Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Execution.ProjectPropertyInstance GetProperty (string propertyName, string subToolsetVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Execution.ProjectPropertyInstance GetProperty(string propertyName, string subToolsetVersion) cil managed
Public Function GetProperty (propertyName As String, subToolsetVersion As String) As ProjectPropertyInstance
public: Microsoft::Build::Execution::ProjectPropertyInstance ^ GetProperty(System::String ^ propertyName, System::String ^ subToolsetVersion);

param.name: propertyName
param.span: The name of the property.

span.span: The name of the property.

param.name: subToolsetVersion
param.span: The sub toolset version of the sub toolset.

span.span: The sub toolset version of the sub toolset.

param.span: May be null

span.span: May be null

summary.span: Gets property specified by the given property name and sub toolset version.

span.span: Gets property specified by the given property name and sub toolset version.

returns.span: Returns the property specified, if it is found, otherwise returns null.

span.span: Returns the property specified, if it is found, otherwise returns null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn die Eigenschaft nicht in die unter-Toolsets gefunden wird, sucht nach der Eigenschaft in der Basis-Toolset.If the property is not found in the sub toolset, searches for the property in the base toolset. Wenn die Eigenschaft nicht in die unter-Toolsets oder im basistoolset gefunden wird, gibt Sie null zurück.If the property is not found in the sub toolset or the base toolset, returns null.
